reviews.text: lot of floaters, not what I expected from this beer and it akes away from this beer considerable as far as I am concerned. It has a nice flavor and taste but I cant get past the floaters and who says these beers have to be cloudy, I would prefer some filtration When I brew this beer it will filter it no matter the style says.
Stella pours golden with a nice thick head. Smooth hit on the tongue with a nice bitter bite at the end. Always a good drink to have.
It is lighter tasting than it looks- it looks and drinks awesome out of a keg, not sure about the bottle....not a fan of anything in bottles though.Go GRIZ!
